title: Sans serif - reminds me of Gill.
content:
Morning all,

I'd like to know the name of this face please,  
Sorry for the image… I hope it's not too small!

Thanks!

Kenny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417081233im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fast_type_6399.jpg)

Font: 

 Eras 

Solved By:

author: kenny.razzell

comments.content: [Eras](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417081233/http:/www.identifont.com/show?3AEL) by Albert Boton and Albert Hollenstien.

This is probably the upright version of Eras that was shipped with Adobe apps in the 90's(?). I believe it was created/revised by Adobe because the subtle slant of the original Eras printed poorly on postscript printers at the time.
